All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AcceptInvite
Screen for accepting an invite.
Account
Generic account class.
BlackJack
Activity for Blackjack.
Card
Generic representation of a card object.
CreateAccountActivity
Activity for the user to create and register a new account with the backend.
CreateParty
Screen for creating a party.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FriendsListActivity
Screen which displays the current user's friends list.
GameOver
Game over screen.
GlobalChatActivity
Class representing the Global Chat.
HomeScreenActivity
The home screen for the app.

The login screen.
Menu
Menu screen for navigating between the home screen, icons, and party screens.
Mole
Used in Whac-A-Mole.
MyApplication
Custom application scope for the whole app.
Party
Party screen.
PlayerStats
Class representing a player's stats for a particular game.
ProfileIcons
Screen showing the different profile icons a user can select.
TexasHoldem
Activity for the Texas Hold 'Em game.
VolleySingleton
A singleton for volley connection instances.
War
Activiy for the single-player war game.
WarMultiplayer
Activity for the multiplayer war game.
WebSocketListener
Interface defining methods for handling WebSocket events.
WebSocketManager
Singleton WebSocketManager instance used for managing WebSocket connections in the Android application.
WhacAMoleActivity
Activity for the Whac-A-Mole game.
